item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is Antoine Soetewey. I am a PhD student in statistics at UCLouvain (Belgium). My research interests focus on survival analysis and bio-statistical procedures applied to cancer patients. In parallel with my doctoral thesis, I am teaching assistant for several courses in statistics and probability at bachelor and masterâ€™s level. I also provide trainings and workshops in statistics and R in a belgian consulting company. For more information about myself please visit www.
